usage: resistance training, fitness classes, at-home workouts to tone and sculpt arms, shoulders and back
key_features: Set of 2 dumbbells for resistance training
Hexagonal shape for easy stacking and roll-free use
Easy-grip neoprene coating for secure hold
Color-stable coating resistant to fading and wear
Precision hex shape for enhanced ground stability
Carbon-free composition for cleaner, safer finish
ai_description: Two vibrant pink dumbbells with a smooth neoprene coating rest on a clean white surface. Each dumbbell features crisp white 'KAKSS' branding and '0.5 KG' weight markings on the hexagonal ends. The matte pink finish provides a comfortable, non-slip grip surface. The precision hex shape prevents rolling and allows for stable storage. The dumbbells appear new with no visible wear on the durable coating.
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
